definition.name: NXimage_set

symbol.name: n_images
symbol.doc: Number of images in the stack.

symbol.name: n_y
symbol.doc: Number of pixel per image in the slow direction.

symbol.name: n_x
symbol.doc: Number of pixel per image in the fast direction.

definition.doc:
Base class for reporting a set of images.
This class provides a base vocabulary to be used for specialized :ref:`NXimage_set` base classes like :ref:`NXimage_r_set` and :ref:`NXimage_c_set`.

group.doc: Details how NXdata instance inside instance of (specialized) :ref:`NXimage_set` were processed from the detector readings/raw data.

group.name: source
group.doc: Resolvable data artifact (e.g. filename) from which the all values in the :ref:`NXdata` instances in this :ref:`NXimage_set` were loaded during parsing.

field.name: mode
field.doc: Imaging (data collection) mode of the instrument during acquisition of the data in this :ref:`NXimage_set` instance.

field.name: detector_identifier
field.doc: Link or name of an :ref:`NXdetector` instance with which the data were collected.
